section.title: Adventures with Drools
section.para: Based on the Adventure in Prolog, over at the Amzi website, http://www.amzi.com/AdventureInProlog/, we started to work on a text adventure game for Drools. They are ideal as they can start off simple and build in complexity and size over time, they also demonstrate key aspects of declarative relational programming.
section.programlisting: Name: Example Text Adventure Main class: org.drools.games.adventure.TextAdventure
section.para: You can view the 8 minute demonstration and introduction for the example at http://downloads.jboss.org/drools/videos/text-adventures.swf
